title="sedans" href="http://rumors.automobilemag.com/vehicle-types/sedans/"> sedans.`` You're going to see a new architecture on the line, a completely different architecture, completely rethought,'' Sergio Marchionne told Automotive News at the event. That idea is simply part of Sergio Marchionne 's plan to reduce the complexity of Chrysler( and, subsequently, Fiat's) product portfolio.
